- frontend-api-url-refactor: Fix 176 hardcoded localhost:3001 URLs across
  49 files to use versioned relative URLs (/api/v1/...) (~9-10 hours)

Key Decisions:
- API versioning: All routes will use /api/v1/ prefix
- Remote access: nginx proxies all requests, internal services not exposed
- AI ready: OpenAPI docs enable MCP server for future AI features
